attributes.action: Let dancing be allowed at weddings now
attributes.additional_details: Lots of people have changed their wedding date hoping that restrictions would be eased on 21/6. Planning had to be re-done, extra financial costs have been incurred. People don’t want their guests in their wedding photos in masks, people want to be able to dance, sing and have the greatest time on such an important day in their lives. The social distancing at a wedding where most people know each other is a joke when football fans are running about jumping over each other!
attributes.background: Let people have weddings the way they want
